titleStmt.title: The fift lampe of virginitie conteining sundrie forms of christian praiers and meditations, to bee vsed onlie of and for all sorts and degrees of women, in their seuerall ages and callings ... A treatise verie needful for this time, and profitable to the Church: now newlie compiled to the glorie of God, & comfort of al godlie women, by the said T.B. Gentleman.
Monument of matrones. Part 5.
titleStmt.author: Bentley, Thomas, student of Gray's Inn.
Abergavenny, Frances Nevill, Lady, d. 1576.

publicationStmt.publisher: By H. Denham, dwelling in Pater noster Rowe, at the signe of the Starre, being the assigne of William Seres,

notesStmt.note: Issued as part 5 of "The monument of matrones".
Compiled from the writings of Frances Abergavenny and others.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Pater noster Rowe, at the signe of the Starre, being the assigne of William Seres
